entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
